name: Rooty's Adventures: Quest for the Root Beer Float
name_original: Rooty's Adventures: Quest for the Root Beer Float
description:
This game has been made during the 2023 Global Game Jam.

This is the story of Rooty, a mischievous Root Beer Can with dreams of becoming a Root Beer Float. Maneuver through the city as Rooty to gather enough money to buy ice cream and become a Root Beer Float.

Gain Fizz Meter by shaking the can and release it to fly or shoot, but don't let it get too high or Rooty will explode !

Controls:

Mouse + KeyboardController (Xbox)MoveWASDLeft JoystickLookMouseRight JoystickFlySpace while upside downA while upside downShootSpace while uprightA while uprightResetRB

Made with Love by team Steve :

  • Craig Kogan - Programming / Level Design
  • Lorenzo Velasque Guerrero - Programming / Music
  • Martin Briand - Programming / Gameplay
  • Jeremy Lachance - Lead 3D Art / Texturing
  • Johnny Sioufi - 3D Art / Texturing
  • Emma Paradis - 3D Art / Illustrations
